TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. It now returns "A" every time.

I wish I could take a vacation.

Granted. You land in hawaii, but all the volcanoes on each of the windward isles (Hawai'i, Maui, Oahu, Etc.) erupt at once.

I wish to be a gallifreyan time lord with my own type 40 tardis!

Granted. You become the Master after stealing the Doctor's TARDIS. Now you've got some work to do to keep it!

I wish I could go home right now.

Granted. Your house is on fire.

I wish I could find cheap, good tasting food that won't make me fat.

Granted. You only eat sacharine, which soon gets you short of vitamins and eventually leads to a total organ failure.

I wish there was no terrorists.

Granted, there was no longer any terrorists in the past, instead they all time-warp to the current time. We're all now royally screwed.

I wish terrorism was properly documented and publicised.

Granted. But all the terrorists that document terrorism are suicidal, and they only use bombs, which kind screws with the documents and only their names get eventually publicized.

I wish to know if suicidal bombers are, in fact, ill comprehended hardcore puzzle lovers.

Granted. They aren't and your plane explodes.

I wish to be a time lord that isnt the master.

Granted. You are lord of only 0/1 of time.

I wish "magic 8 ball" internet got replaced by "magic ouija board" of demon summon

Granted. Your missing the thing to communicate with the dead. (We found one with that same prob)

Because of my other two wishes to be a time lord failing, I want to be the DOCTOR HIMSELF.

Granted, The American Medical Association recognizes you as Him Self, M.D., and you are sued by hundreds for malpractice.

I wish the Internet wasn't so stupid.

Granted. The internet makes people stupid.

I wish that spaceship & object trajectories could be seen by humans irl.

Granted, your view is now completely blocked by pink lines showing the trajectory of every object in the Universe.

I wish I found out why my game crashes.

Granted. You have been blinded in return.

I wish evryon liekd mudkipz.

Granted. Then everyone hates them, and kills anyone who does

I wish I could be happy

Granted. You have a brain tumor that floods your brain with dopamine.

I wish I was a little bit taller.

Granted. You are now a little bit taller, and a baller.

I wish my Gnomoria village would survive.

Granted. However, your game is labeled "UNORIGINAL" by the Wishmaking Fairy and he turns it into Towns.

I wish that every unoriginal game merged with its original to make something naturally inferior.

Granted. However, that inferior game gets a AI and goes power crazy.

I wish that I had a better laptop for KSP.

Granted. You get Lucifer's laptop( basically windows 8, which is terrible), he gets your soul( for all eternity).

I wish that souls weren't real.

Granted. They aren't.

I wish everyone worshiped Shreck.

Granted. Among Shrek's commandments is "Thou shalt see no animated characters but me." So long, mudkips and MLP.

I wish Guns 'n' Roses had stayed together.

Granted. The rose jams the gun & it explodes, killing you.

I wish wishes were in present tense and not past tense.

Grant. Past tense is no more, no discussion of past, only future!

I wish I am a better guitarist.

Granted. The paparazzi don't give you a break now, and even photograph you when you are uhm... (insert your word for mating here)

I wish to be a god.
